title: i cant stop laughing but i feel so bad ):
body:
My friend logged in for the first time in 2 years today, and her name was changed to something indecent as all hell, she's so bothered by it and i feel bad for her but at the same time it's so god damn funny because of what it is. Apparently no1 knew her password which makes it even more hilarious. hahahah 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
if it is actually "indecent" and "offensive" your friend can actually ask for a free name change with a support ticket.

Riot is all about getting rid of offensive names.
see, i knew not to add the name because all u thirsty isis would add her ingame and try to get some

A while ago they had a summoner name reset. Accounts that were unplayed for a certain amount of time lost their summoner names. This was because names that people wanted were taken by alot of lvl 1 accounts.
